content.text: Match ends, Burnley 1, Manchester City 1.
Second Half ends, Burnley 1, Manchester City 1.
Ashley Barnes (Burnley) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Ashley Barnes (Burnley).
Nicolás Otamendi (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Sam Vokes (Burnley) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Kyle Walker (Manchester City).
Hand ball by Ashley Barnes (Burnley).
Attempt missed. Bernardo Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Kyle Walker.
Goal!  Burnley 1, Manchester City 1. Johann Berg Gudmundsson (Burnley) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Matthew Lowton with a cross.
Attempt missed. Kevin Long (Burnley) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Johann Berg Gudmundsson with a cross following a corner.
